类 Shape

  • java.lang.Object
    • Shape

  • public class Shape
extends java.lang.Object

    This is the Shape class!

    The Shape class is used to model general shapes. It has private instance variables for storing color, fill-type, orientation, screen coordinates of the center, and the local coordinates of the vertices of a shape. It has getters and setters for accessing its private instance variables. It also has methods for translating and rotating a shape, and for getting the screen coordinates of the vertices of a shape.

    从以下版本开始:
    2016-09-24
    版本:
    1.0
    作者:
    CChen

      a method for retrieving the color of the shape.
      boolean getFilled()
      a method for retrieving the fill-type of the shape.
      double getTheta()
      a method for retrieving the orientation (in radians) of the shape in the screen coordinate system.
      int[] getX()
      a method for retrieving the x-coordinates of the vertices of the shape in the screen coordinate system
      double getXc()
      a method for retrieving the x-coordinate of the center of the shape in the screen coordinate system.
      double[] getXLocal()
      a method for retrieving the x-coordinates of the vertices of the shape in its local coordinate system
      int[] getY()
      a method for retrieving the y-coordinates of the vertices of the shape in the screen coordinate system
      double getYc()
      C a method for retrieving the y-coordinate of the center of the shape in the screen coordinate system.
      double[] getYLocal()
      a method for retrieving the y-coordinates of the vertices of the shape in its local coordinate system.
      void rotate(double dt)
      a method for rotating the shape about its center by an angle of dt (in radians).
      void setCenter(double xc, double yc)
      a method for setting the coordinates of the center of the shape in the screen coordinate system
      void setColor(java.awt.Color color)
      a method for setting the color of the shape

      a method for setting the fill-type of the shape

      a method for setting the orientation of the shape

      a method for setting the x-coordinates of the vertices of the shape in its local coordinate system
      void setYc(double yc)
      a method for setting the y-coordinate of the center of the shape in the screen coordinate system.
      void setYLocal(double[] yLocal)
      a method for setting the y-coordinates of the vertices of the shape in its local coordinate system
      void translate(double dx, double dy)
      a method for translating the center of the shape by dx and dy, respectively, along the x and y directions of the screen coordinate system.

        public void setCenter(double xc,
                      double yc)
        a method for setting the coordinates of the center of the shape in the screen coordinate system
        参数:
        xc - the value to be set to xc
        yc - the value to be set to yc

      • setXLocal

        参数:
        yLocal - the value to be set

      • translate

        public void translate(double dx,
                      double dy)
        a method for translating the center of the shape by dx and dy, respectively, along the x and y directions of the screen coordinate system. (dx and dy should be added to xc and yc respectively.)
        参数:
        dx - the value to be added to xc
        dy - the value to be added to yc

      • rotate

        public void rotate(double dt)
        a method for rotating the shape about its center by an angle of dt (in radians). (dt should be added to theta.)
        参数:
        dt - the value to be added to theta

      • getX

        public int[] getX()
        a method for retrieving the x-coordinates of the vertices of the shape in the screen coordinate system
        返回:
        int[] the respective coordinates

      • getY

        public int[] getY()
        a method for retrieving the y-coordinates of the vertices of the shape in the screen coordinate system
        返回:
        int[] the respective coordinates
